python.linting.pylintArgs: --enable=F, E, unreachable, duplicate-key, unnecessary-semicolon, global-variable-not-assigned, unused-variable, binary-op-exception, bad-format-string, anomalous-backslash-in-string, bad-open-mode
--disable=invalid-name, missing-module-docstring, missing-class-docstring, missing-method-docstring, missing-function-docstring, consider-using-enumerate, line-too-long
